title: Honor Capsule Drop Rate?
body: Last time i got an honor capsule was about a month ago when i hit honor level 3.So when am i expected to get one again? my gf hit level 3 two days before me and she already got hers like a week ago..

replies.body:
Haha, my friend ^^
Be happy with your capsule! I became honor level 3 fairly fast and are already level 5 now and still havent got a single capsule. My honor 3 Friends alredy got 1-3 of them, so it's basically luck if you get one or not. Drop rates seem to be quite low :P

Key fragment drops are still 12 per ~28 days, and a capsule is a random chance to substitute that.  If you reached you limit, you may need to wait for the reset to see an increased drop rate again.  Keep in mind that honor capsules are still random, though.
